page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The entertainment in this area is average.It provides for all age groups.i.e For young children there are five playgroups.For teenagers there are two youth clubs which provide plenty of activities. These get young people involved with other youth clubs in competitions,fund raising and other ideas. For older people there is bingo, and OAP clubs.There is Margam country park which provides for all ages with a boating lake,country walks and a wide variety of wildlife.Plays are held there occasionally these are usually very enjoyable. There is also an Historical Society and a Drama group, both of which are well patronised.
